**AFTER DOWNLOADING MAKE SURE YOU HAVE THE IMAGE EXPANSION AND IMAGE HOVER FROM 4CHANS SETTINGS MENU  DISABLED EVERYTHING ELSE IS FINE, THE MENU IS LOCATED IN THE TOP RIGHT OF THE SCREEN**

This extension is a script that adds various features to the image board 4chan and 4channel these features include:


-Image hover preview:
Hover your mouse over an image to get a preview of the higher quality version theres 2 versions no1. dynamic positioning you can move the preview left and right by moving your cursor left and right. no2. the default hover behaviour non moving placed on the right of the screen.

-Image grid:
Creates a grid of all images within the thread if you click on an image it can take you to a fullscreen version of the image or to the post in the thread depending on what you choose in the settings menu.

-Load images as you scroll the thread option:
This utilizes an infinite scroll tactic to lazy load images in as you will need them this is recommended for bigger threads with a lot of images to save your bandwith.

-Mass downloading images in thread with original file names:
Added the option to mass download images with their original file names make sure you have the option "Ask where to save each file before downloading" which is located via settings -> downloads if this is left on when mass downloading you will be prompted to save every file you have selected to download.

-Full screen image viewing:
You can click on an image in the image grid to go fullscreen on the image 

-Slideshow functionality:
This allows you to view all images in the thread via a fullscreen slideshow with personalizable slide interval length.

-Expand all images
This will go through and expand all images and videos in the thread 

-Customizable keybinds 
I have provided many keybinds in the settings menu that you can customize to your liking these include: Keybind to instantly go to image grid, Keybind to expand all images, Keybind to go fullscreen, Keybind to go to the top of the thread and Keybind to go to the bottom of the thread.
